rukus.text: 37|1|Seizento retsu o nasu-sha-tachi ni oi te.
37|2|Karitate ou mono ni oi te.
37|3|Mata kunkai (no kuruan) o yomi kika seru mono ni oite, chikau.
37|4|Hontoni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no omodearu.
37|5|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono no shu, mata hinode o tsukasa doru omodearu.
37|6|Hontoni ware wa, shinshin de kaso no ten o kazari,
37|7|(arra no meirei ni) sakarau akuma ni taisuru mori to shita.
37|8|Kare-ra wa happo kara uta re, saiko no kaigi o nusumi kiku koto wa dekinai.
37|9|Gekitai sa rete, kare-ra wa towa no chobatsu o ukeru.
37|10|Tocho shi eta mono ga atte mo, hakunetsu no hono ga tsuiseki suru.

37|11|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni toe. `Kare-ra to ware no tsukutta mono (tenshi) no dochira ga tsuyoku tsukura rete iru ka.' Ware wa motomoto, nebari no aru doro de kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
37|12|Anata wa kantan shite iru to iu no ni, kare-ra wa chosho suru.
37|13|Keikoku sa rete mo, kare-ra wa keikoku o ukeirenai.
37|14|Mata kare-ra wa, shirushi o mite mo chosho suru bakari.
37|15|Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa akiraka ni majutsu ni chigai arimasen.
37|16|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara,(mata) yobiokosa remashou ka.
37|17|Toi sosen-tachi mo (issho nidesu ka) to iu.
37|18|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Sonotori. Anata gata wa iyashime rareru nodearu.'
37|19|Sore wa tada hitokoe no sakebidearu. Sonotoki kare-ra wa (osoroshi kokei o) manoatari ni mite,
37|20|`a nasakenai, kore ga shinpan no hidesu ka.' To iu.
37|21|`Kore wa anata gata ga shinjinakatta kubun no hidearu.
